name: ChickenPrints
description:
This is an autoBiographical student game designed to convey an emotion we felt strongly in a part of our life

In Chickenprints you will need to feed care for and manage your chickens in this small 2D pixel art farming style game. 

The chickens need to be fed daily and the eggs collected and hatched through the use of the incubator. 

this is as of yet an unfinshed game and there are some bugs pertaining to the medication system in the game that I plan on fixing in later updates.

ARTIST STATEMENT:

Sometimes in life even the most joyous and rewarding experiences can come with Dark and confronting consequences. This game represents for me a time in which I had to change everything I had once said about myself for the greater good of my stock. Big changes took root in me in the short week it took for me to first stuggle with and then grieve over and finally accept and celebrate the quality of life and my convictions. 

I sincerly hope you enjoy your playthrough as much as I enjoyed creating the space for you to glimps a little of what it meant to be me in this time.
